title: Arcana World
description: Homebrewed Content for the Arcana World Setting

actualizer.label: Actualizer
actualizer.description: You are a being imbued with mystical energies which you use to distort the very fabric that composes your reality.

invoker.label: Invoker
invoker.description: You invoke your will into the shape of a figure which stands besides you in all trials and tribulations.

tao.label: Tao
tao.description: A special energy that encompasses all of reality, holding all four essences.

bloodArt.label: Blood Art
bloodArt.description: Blood Arts are special techniques exclusive to those called Hemoknights. These techniques are abilities that are utilized through the visceral power of blood.

greaterFacet.label: Greater Facet
greaterFacet.description: A Facet is an ability, effect or property of a mentem. A Facet of this type grants a greater ability, effect or property.

kineticCharm.label: Kinetic Charm
kineticCharm.description: The exclusive trait of the Kinetic Charm..

lesserFacet.label: Lesser Facet
lesserFacet.description: A Facet is an ability, effect or property of a mentem. A Facet of this type grants a lesser ability, effect or property.

majorFacet.label: Major Facet
majorFacet.description: A Facet is an ability, effect or property of a mentem. A Facet of this type grants a major ability, effect or property.

mentem.label: Mentem
mentem.description: Mentems are special items created with the essences of Mind and Spirit synthesized into the essence of Matter. Actions, Effects and Items with this trait are always tied to a Mentem of some kind.

minorFacet.label: Minor Facet
minorFacet.description: A Facet is an ability, effect or property of a mentem. A Facet of this type grants a minor ability, effect or property.

supremeFacet.label: Supreme Facet
supremeFacet.description: A Facet is an ability, effect or property of a mentem. A Facet of this type grants a supreme ability, effect or property.

tao.label: Tao
tao.description: A special energy that encompasses all of reality, holding all four essences.

unity.label: Unity
unity.description: Special composite impulses which require two or more separate kineticists to be used. Due to the nature of these impulses, the kineticists need to be within a certain distance of each other along with other requirements. These impulses will never have the overflow trait but each has a frequency of 1 or more rounds.

quantum.label: Quantum
quantum.description: A special focus Spell that manipulates the fabric of reality.

tao.label: Tao
tao.description: A special energy that encompasses all of reality, holding all four essences.

bloodWeapon.label: Blood Weapon
bloodWeapon.description: Blood Weapons are weapons made from the visceral energies found in blood, typically crafted and wielded by hemoknights.

greaterFacet.label: Greater Facet
greaterFacet.description: A Facet is an ability, effect or property of a mentem. A Facet of this type grants a greater ability, effect or property.

kineticCharm.label: Kinetic Charm
kineticCharm.description: The exclusive trait of the Kinetic Charm..

lesserFacet.description: A Facet is an ability, effect or property of a mentem. A Facet of this type grants a lesser ability, effect or property.

majorFacet.description: A Facet is an ability, effect or property of a mentem. A Facet of this type grants a major ability, effect or property.

mentem.label: Mentem
mentem.description: Mentems are special items created with the essences of Mind and Spirit synthesized into the essence of Matter. Actions, Effects and Items with this trait are always tied to a Mentem of some kind.

minorFacet.label: Minor Facet
minorFacet.description: A Facet is an ability, effect or property of a mentem. A Facet of this type grants a minor ability, effect or property.

rush.label: Rush
rush.description: Rush: This weapon becomes more dangerous when true momentum is put behind it. If your last action before making a Strike with a rush weapon was a move action or if you use an action that lets you move before making a Strike with this weapon, increase the size of this weapon's damage die by one step for every 10 feet you moved, up to a maximum of three steps. Additionally, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the attack roll of the Strike if you've moved at least 20 feet and a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll of the Strike if you've moved at least 40 feet.
